author: Rebecca Klar
title: Surgeon general asks holdout states to 'give us a week' of coronavirus restrictions
description: Surgeon General Jerome Adams is calling on the handful of governors who have yet to issue stay-at-home orders to at least enforce restrictions for one week in order to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus....
content:
Surgeon General Jerome Adams is calling on the handful of governors who have yet to issue stay-at-home orders to at least enforce restrictions for one week in order to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus. 
Ninety percent of Americans are doing their part,… [+1222 chars]
